function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreasing efficiency of UV-C system due to lamp degradation and environmental factors.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in eradicating pathogens and controlling contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance, timely lamp replacement, and environmental monitoring.","Technologies":"UV-C system with adjustable ballast, reflective surfaces, and temperature and dust sensors.","People":"Occupants of buildings with HVAC systems, public health officials, and facility maintenance staff.","Owner":"Facility management, HVAC maintenance teams, and public health authorities."}]}
